content: Hello there, I'm Rafael Sanchez, a 2nd year Maths-ComputerEngineering student from Spain and I'm interested in the implementation of the Astronomical Unit in BRL-CAD. It's also said it's recommended to submit some patches and join the IRC channel. It's better this chat or the IRC channel to discuss the topic? Thanks!

Hi @Rafael Sanchez Sanchez you can use both, but because of the asynchronicity of the discussions between people from different time zones I prefer Zulip for myself. For the IRC you have to be online (or a running chat process, e.g. in something like screen) to receive the answer. The log of the IRC channel is available here: http://infobot.rikers.org/%23brlcad/
@Rafael Sanchez Sanchez I agree that here is probably better, at least for gsoc, though you're welcome to join both
